summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a matter that is described as having 'virtually no exposure.' The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and suggests that it may involve sensitive information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of an investment bank at JPMorgan, communicating with Jeffrey Epstein regarding a confidential matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email from Jes Staley and is referenced in the context of a confidential communication.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan, is in a professional relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, who is a client or associate.

keyFacts: The email was sent on November 25, 2009, from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein.
Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of an investment bank at JPMorgan.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.
The subject of the email suggests a discussion about financial exposure.
There is a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content.
